name: Characterize_iT
description:
Characterize_iT
audio-visual-virtual-experience

FOR BEST EXPERIENCE:

 USE WITH HEADPHONES
Screen RESOLUTION: 1920x1080

CONTROLS:

W  WALK  FORWARD
A   WALK LEFT
S   WALK BACK
D  WALK RIGHT

MOUSE    LOOK AROUND

F   FLY
1 2 3 4  VISION CHANGE



Our experience takes place in three different rooms/states. Each of it has a variety of scenes, in each scene you have a new perception and experience of the place. Everey room altought has its own main characteristic.

The tunnel is mainly a visual experience in which the views get shifted/distorted/mirrored.

The bar is an auditive experience which through its scenes evolves from a bar, which has similarities to one in the real world, to a virtual space which produces music by walking through triggers.

The third "room" is the state of mind. This place has a different appearance in each scene. In each of them you will somehow be taken out of place by confusion, sound and visual experience. It should represent your subconscious and it`s expansion with the goal to lead you back to your consciousness in order to escape this state.

By finding and activating different triggers you interact with the room and it´s possibilities and finally you are able to swich scenes.

Hints will be given to you through written  text in order to simplify your way through some confusing and complicated scenaros.

The goal of this project is to let the user have an uniqe virtual experience which expands it´s cognition in the virtual world.
